✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Well described problem. Easy enough to solve. Test cases were sufficient in number. While I think there have been other disease or fire spreading problems already on the site, I haven't seen them only moving diagonally, nor picking from the results of several simulations.
I hope you received enough feedback from the community to improve your contribution. Once you have made the necessary updates, publish your contribution!
good contribution I think, the code is interesting to do, I finished it in around 15 minutes and I enjoyed doing it ! :)
